title: Towards Green and Efficient Chemical Looping Ammonia Synthesis: Design Principles and Advanced Redox Catalysts
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00037D, Review Article
Xianhua Zhang, Chunlei Pei, Zhi-Jian Zhao, Jinlong Gong
Ammonia plays an essential role in agriculture and next-generation energy systems but is currently synthesized industrially through the Haber-Bosh (HB) process under harsh conditions resulting in high CO2 emissions. Chemical...
